meanings.definition: A person or company that supplies goods or services
meanings.sent1: The providers delivered fresh vegetables to the market.
meanings.sent2: The healthcare providers offered medical check-ups to the community.
meanings.sent3: The providers accidentally sent a shipment of bananas instead of apples.
meanings.sent4: The providers were like superheroes, bringing essential supplies to those in need.
meanings.sent5: The providers were known for their reliable and timely deliveries.

meanings.definition: One that makes something available for use
meanings.sent1: The internet providers ensured everyone had access to high-speed connection.
meanings.sent2: The library providers loaned out books to eager readers.
meanings.sent3: The providers magically made the last piece of cake disappear.
meanings.sent4: The providers of knowledge opened the doors to a world of learning.
meanings.sent5: The providers of electricity kept the lights on during the storm.
